languages.ja: ファイナルダイブクラッシュ

short.en: Destroys the target's held berry.

detailed.en: Inflicts regular damage.  If the target is holding a berry, it's destroyed and cannot be used in response to this move.

flavortext.en: The user attacks opposing Pokémon with fire. If a Pokémon is holding a certain item, such as a Berry, the item becomes burned up and unusable.
flavortext.ko: 불꽃으로 상대를 공격한다. 상대가 나무열매 등을 지니고 있을 때 불태워서 쓸 수 없게 만든다.
flavortext.de: Eine Feuer-Attacke. Trägt ein gegnerisches Pokémon eine Beere oder ein ähnliches Item bei sich, wird dieses von den Flammen verzehrt und geht verloren.
flavortext.fr: Des flammes calcinent l’ennemi. S’il tient un objet, une Baie par exemple, celui-ci est brûlé et devient inutilisable.
flavortext.es: Llamas que golpean a los objetivos adyacentes. Si estos llevan bayas o ciertos objetos, se quemarán y ya no se podrán usar.
flavortext.ja: 炎で　相手を　攻撃する。 相手が　きのみなどを　持っているとき 燃やして　使えなくする。

short.en: Never misses.

detailed.en: Inflicts regular damage.  Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers.

flavortext.en: The user strikes the target with a quick jolt of electricity. This attack never misses.
flavortext.ko: 전격을 재빠르게 상대에게 날린다. 공격은 반드시 명중한다.
flavortext.de: Angriff mit schnellem Elektro-Schlag. Ausweichen nicht möglich.
flavortext.fr: Le lanceur envoie un choc électrique rapide à l’ennemi. Impossible à esquiver.
flavortext.es: Ataque eléctrico muy rápido e ineludible.
flavortext.ja: 電撃を　素早く 相手に　浴びせる。 攻撃は　必ず　命中する。

short.en: User receives 1/3 the damage inflicted in recoil.

detailed.en: Inflicts regular damage.  User takes 1/3 the damage it inflicts in recoil.

flavortext.en: The user tucks in its wings and charges from a low altitude. This also damages the user quite a lot.
flavortext.ko: 날개를 접어 저공비행으로 돌격한다. 자신도 상당한 데미지를 입는다.
flavortext.de: Anwender greift aus niedriger Höhe an. Er erleidet bei dieser Attacke selbst großen Schaden.
flavortext.fr: Le lanceur replie ses ailes et charge en rase-mottes. Blesse gravement le lanceur.
flavortext.es: Pliega sus alas y ataca con un vuelo rasante. El  Pokémon que lo usa también resulta seriamente  dañado.
flavortext.ja: はねを　おりたたみ 低空飛行で　突撃する。 自分も　かなり　ダメージを　受ける。

short.en: Raises the target's Special Attack by one stage and confuses the target.

detailed.en: Raises the target's Special Attack by one stage, then confuses it.

flavortext.de: Schmeichelt dem Ziel, um es zu verwirren. Erhöht dessen Spezial-Angriff.
flavortext.en: Flattery is used to confuse the target. However, this also raises the target’s Sp. Atk stat.
flavortext.ko: 상대를 부추겨서 혼란시킨다. 동시에 상대의 특수공격도 올라가 버린다.
flavortext.fr: Rend la cible confuse, mais augmente son Attaque Spéciale.
flavortext.ja: 相手を　おだてて　混乱させる。 同時に　相手の　特攻も あげてしまう。
flavortext.es: Halaga al objetivo y lo confunde, pero también sube su Ataque Especial.

short.en: Lowers the target's Attack by one stage.

detailed.en: Lowers the target's Attack by one stage.

flavortext.en: The user and the target become friends, and the target loses its will to fight. This lowers the target’s Attack stat.
flavortext.ko: 상대와 친해져서 싸울 마음을 잃게 하여 상대의 공격을 떨어뜨린다.
flavortext.de: Der Anwender schließt mit dem Ziel Freundschaft und nimmt ihm seine Angriffslust. Der Angriffs-Wert des Zieles sinkt.
flavortext.fr: L’ennemi se lie d’amitié avec le lanceur et perd sa combativité, diminuant son Attaque.
flavortext.es: Se hace amigo de su oponente y consigue que a este se le quiten las ganas de combatir. Además, reduce su Ataque.
flavortext.ja: 相手と　なかよくなって 戦う　気力を　失わせ 相手の　攻撃を　さげる。

short.en: Raises the Attack and Special Attack of all friendly Pokémon with plus or minus by one stage.

detailed.en: Raises the Attack and Special Attack of all friendly Pokémon with plus or minus by one stage.

flavortext.en: The user engages its gears to raise the Attack and Sp. Atk stats of ally Pokémon with the Plus or Minus Ability.
flavortext.ko: 기어를 넣는 것으로 특성 플러스와 마이너스의 공격과 특수공격이 올라간다.
flavortext.de: Der Anwender erhöht mithilfe von Zahnrädern Angriff und Spezial-Angriff von Team-Pokémon mit der Fähigkeit Plus oder Minus.
flavortext.fr: Change de réglage pour augmenter l’Attaque et l’Attaque Spéciale des alliés ayant les talents Plus ou Moins.
flavortext.es: Cambia de marcha y logra aumentar el Ataque y el Ataque Especial de los Pokémon aliados que cuenten con las habilidades Más y Menos.
flavortext.ja: ギアを　入れる　ことによって 特性　プラスと　マイナスの 攻撃と　特攻が　あがる。

short.en: Causes a one-hit KO.

detailed.en:
Inflicts damage equal to the target's max HP.  Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers.  This move's accuracy is 30% plus 1% for each level the user is higher than the target.  If the user is a lower level than the target, this move will fail.

Because this move inflicts a specific and finite amount of damage, endure still prevents the target from fainting.

The effects of lock on, mind reader, and no guard still apply, as long as the user is equal or higher level than the target.  However, they will not give this move a chance to break through detect or protect.

flavortext.en: A vicious, tearing attack with big pincers. The target faints instantly if this attack hits.
flavortext.ko: 큰 집게로 상대를 베어 갈라 공격한다. 맞으면 일격에 기절한다.
flavortext.de: Ein Angriff mit einer großen Schere. Trifft die Attacke, führt sie beim Ziel sofort zum K.O.
flavortext.fr: Des pinces lacèrent violemment l’ennemi, le mettant K.O. sur le coup s’il est touché.
flavortext.es: Ataque cortante que debilita al oponente de un golpe si acierta.
flavortext.ja: 大きな　ハサミで 相手を　切り裂いて　攻撃する。 当たれば　一撃で　ひんしに　する。

short.en: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 20% chance to lower the target's Defense by one stage.

detailed.en: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 20% chance to lower the target's Defense by one stage.

flavortext.en: The user attacks by beating the target with a bone that contains a spirit. This may also lower the target’s Defense stat.
flavortext.ko: 영혼이 머물고 있는 뼈로 상대를 세게 때려서 공격한다. 상대의 방어를 떨어뜨릴 때가 있다.
flavortext.de: Der Anwender greift das Ziel mit einem Knochen an, in dem eine Seele haust. Senkt eventuell die Verteidigung des Zieles.
flavortext.fr: Le lanceur frappe avec un os possédé par l’âme d’un défunt. Peut aussi baisser la Défense de la cible.
flavortext.es: Ataca al oponente golpeándole con un hueso poseído por un espíritu. Puede reducir la Defensa del objetivo.
flavortext.ja: 魂の　宿った　ホネで 相手を　なぐりつけて　攻撃する。 相手の　防御を　さげる　ことがある。

short.en: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

detailed.en: Inflicts regular damage.

flavortext.de: Diese Attacke kann nicht eingesetzt werden. Du solltest dein Pokémon sie vergessen lassen. Beachte aber, dass es sich danach nicht wieder an sie erinnern kann.
flavortext.ko: 사용할 수 없는 기술입니다. 다시 배우게 할 수 없지만 기술을 잊게 하는 것을 권장합니다.
flavortext.en: This move can’t be used. It’s recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.
flavortext.fr: Cette capacité ne peut pas être utilisée. Il est recommandé de l’oublier, même s’il sera impossible de se la remémorer une fois oubliée.
flavortext.ja: この技は　使えません 思い出すことが　できなくなりますが 技を　忘れることを　おすすめします
flavortext.es: Este movimiento no se puede usar, por lo que sería mejor olvidarlo, aunque eso implique que no se pueda recordar posteriormente.

short.en: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 10% chance to poison the target.

detailed.en: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 10% chance to poison the target.

flavortext.en: The user strikes everything around it by swamping the area with a giant sludge wave. This may also poison those hit.
flavortext.ko: 오물 파도로 자신의 주위에 있는 포켓몬을 공격한다. 독 상태로 만들 때가 있다.
flavortext.de: Greift alle Pokémon im Umkreis mit einer Schlammwelle an. Diese werden eventuell auch vergiftet.
flavortext.fr: Une vague de détritus attaque tous les Pokémon autour du lanceur. Peut aussi empoisonner.
flavortext.es: Una onda tóxica que daña a los Pokémon de alrededor. Puede envenenar.
flavortext.ja: ヘドロの　波で　自分の 周りに　いるものを　攻撃する。 毒状態に　することが　ある。

short.en: Steals the target's stat increases, then inflicts damage.

detailed.en: Steals the target's stat increases, then inflicts regular damage.  Will not steal stat increases that would put any of the user's stats at more than +6; any excess is left on the target.  Stolen increases are affected by abilities as normal.

flavortext.en: The user hides in the target’s shadow, steals the target’s stat boosts, and then attacks.
flavortext.ko: 상대의 그림자에 숨어들어 상대의 능력이 올라가는 것을 뺏어 공격한다.
flavortext.de: Der Anwender schleicht sich in den Schatten des Zieles, stiehlt dessen erhöhte Statuswerte und fügt ihm Schaden zu.
flavortext.fr: Le lanceur plonge dans l’ombre de la cible, vole ses augmentations de stats et l’attaque.
flavortext.es: El usuario se esconde en la sombra del objetivo y lo ataca tras robarle las mejoras en sus características.
flavortext.ja: 相手の　影に　潜り込み 相手の　能力アップを 奪って　攻撃する。

short.en: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 50% chance to lower the target's Defense by one stage.

detailed.en: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 50% chance to lower the target's Defense by one stage.

flavortext.de: Angriff mit scharfen Klauen. Senkt eventuell den Verteidigungs-Wert.
flavortext.ko: 단단하고 날카로운 손톱으로 베어 갈라서 공격한다. 상대의 방어를 떨어뜨릴 때가 있다.
flavortext.en: The user slashes the target with hard and sharp claws. This may also lower the target’s Defense stat.
flavortext.fr: Lacère l’ennemi avec des griffes solides et aiguisées. Peut aussi baisser sa Défense.
flavortext.ja: 硬く　鋭い　ツメで 切り裂いて　攻撃する。 相手の　防御を　さげることが　ある。
flavortext.es: Hace trizas al objetivo con garras afiladas y puede bajar su Defensa.

short.en: Covers the opposing field, lowering opponents' Speed by one stage upon switching in.

detailed.en:
Shoots a web over the opponents' side of the field, which lowers the Speed of any opposing Pokémon that enters the field by one stage.

Pokémon in the air, such as flying-types and those with levitate, are unaffected.  rapid spin removes Sticky Web from the user's side of the field; defog removes it from both sides.

flavortext.en: The user weaves a sticky net around the opposing team, which lowers their Speed stats upon switching into battle.
flavortext.ko: 상대의 주위에 끈적끈적한 네트를 둘러 펼쳐 교체되어 나온 상대의 스피드를 떨어뜨린다.
flavortext.de: Der Anwender spinnt in der Umgebung des gegnerischen Teams ein klebriges Netz und senkt so die Initiative neu eingewechselter Pokémon.
flavortext.fr: Déploie une toile visqueuse autour de l’ennemi qui ralentit la Vitesse de tout adversaire entrant au combat.
flavortext.es: Coloca una red pegajosa alrededor del equipo rival que baja la Velocidad de cualquier adversario que entre a combatir.
flavortext.ja: 相手の　周りに　ねばねばした ネットを　はりめぐらせ　交代で でてきた　相手の　素早さを　さげる。

short.en: Lowers the user's Attack and Defense by one stage after inflicting damage.

detailed.en: Inflicts regular damage, then lowers the user's Attack and Defense by one stage each.

flavortext.de: Starke Attacke, die jedoch auch den Angriff und die Verteidigung des Anwenders senkt.
flavortext.ko: 엄청난 힘을 발휘하여 상대를 공격한다. 자신의 공격과 방어가 떨어진다.
flavortext.en: The user attacks the target with great power. However, this also lowers the user’s Attack and Defense stats.
flavortext.fr: Une attaque puissante, mais qui baisse l’Attaque et la Défense du lanceur.
flavortext.ja: すごい　力を　発揮して 相手を　攻撃する。自分の 攻撃と　防御が　さがる。
flavortext.es: Ataque de gran potencia, pero que reduce el Ataque y la Defensa del agresor.

short.en: Lowers the target's Special Attack by one stage.

detailed.en: Lowers the target's Special Attack by one stage.

flavortext.de: Der Anwender vertraut dem Ziel ein Geheimnis an und stört auf diese Weise dessen Konzentration. Der Spezial-Angriff des Zieles sinkt.
flavortext.ko: 비밀 이야기를 해서 상대의 집중력을 잃게 하여 특수공격을 떨어뜨린다.
flavortext.en: The user tells the target a secret, and the target loses its ability to concentrate. This lowers the target’s Sp. Atk stat.
flavortext.fr: Dévoile des secrets à l’ennemi, qui perd alors sa concentration et voit son Attaque Spéciale diminuer.
flavortext.ja: ないしょばなしを　することで　相手の 集中力を　失わせ 相手の　特攻を　さげる。
flavortext.es: Hace que el objetivo pierda la concentración  contándole un secreto. Disminuye el Ataque Especial del oponente.

short.en: With Fusion Flare, inflicts double damage.

detailed.en: Inflicts regular damage.  If a friendly Pokémon used fusion flare earlier this turn, this move has double power.

flavortext.de: Feuert einen monströsen Blitz ab. Wird die Attacke durch eine gigantische Flamme modifiziert, steigt die Stärke.
flavortext.en: The user throws down a giant lightning bolt. This move’s power is increased when influenced by an enormous flame.
flavortext.ko: 거대한 천둥을 내리친다. 거대한 불꽃의 영향을 받아 기술의 위력이 올라간다.
flavortext.fr: Projette un orbe électrique gigantesque. L’effet augmente sous l’influence de Flamme Croix.
flavortext.es: Ataca con una enorme descarga eléctrica. Aumenta  su potencia si es influenciada por una gigantesca  llamarada.
flavortext.ja: 巨大な　雷を　たたきつける。 巨大な　炎の　影響を受け 技の　威力が　あがる。

short.en: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 10% chance to paralyze the target.

detailed.en: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 10% chance to paralyze the target.

flavortext.en: A jolt of electricity crashes down on the target to inflict damage. This may also leave the target with paralysis.
flavortext.ko: 전기 자극을 상대에게 날려서 공격한다. 마비 상태로 만들 때가 있다.
flavortext.de: Eine Elektro-Attacke, die das Ziel eventuell paralysiert.
flavortext.fr: Une décharge électrique tombe sur l’ennemi. Peut aussi le paralyser.
flavortext.es: Ataque eléctrico que puede paralizar al objetivo.
flavortext.ja: 電気の　刺激を 相手に　浴びせて　攻撃する。 まひ状態に　することが　ある。

short.en: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

detailed.en: Inflicts regular damage.

flavortext.de: Der Anwender greift alle Pokémon im Umkreis mit einem ätzenden Gas an. Getragene Items werden dadurch zersetzt.
flavortext.ko: 주위에 있는 모든 것을 강력한 산성 가스로 뒤덮어서 지니고 있는 도구를 녹여버린다.
flavortext.en: The user surrounds everything around it with highly acidic gas and melts away items they hold.
flavortext.fr: Un gaz corrosif qui enveloppe tous les Pokémon alentour et qui dissout les objets qu’ils tiennent.
flavortext.ja: 強い　酸性の　ガスで 周りに　いるものを　包みこみ 持っている　道具を　溶かしてしまう。
flavortext.es: El usuario libera un gas cáustico que envuelve a todos los que se encuentren alrededor y derrite por completo los objetos que lleven equipados.

short.en: User vanishes, dodging all attacks, and hits next turn.  Hits through Protect and Detect.

detailed.en:
Inflicts regular damage.  User vanishes for one turn, becoming immune to attack, and hits on the second turn.

This move ignores the effects of detect and protect.

This move cannot be selected by sleep talk.

flavortext.en: The user vanishes somewhere, then strikes the target on the next turn. This move hits even if the target protects itself.
flavortext.ko: 1턴째에 어디론가 사라져서 2턴째에 상대를 공격한다. 기술 방어를 무시하고 공격할 수 있다.
flavortext.de: Der Anwender verschwindet in Runde 1, um seine Kraft zu sammeln, und attackiert in Runde 2. Trifft auch, wenn sich das Ziel selbst schützt.
flavortext.fr: Le lanceur disparaît au premier tour et frappe au second. Cette attaque passe outre les protections.
flavortext.es: El usuario desaparece en el primer turno y ataca a su objetivo en el segundo. Permite acertar aunque el objetivo esté protegiéndose.
flavortext.ja: １ターンめで　どこかに　消えて ２ターンめに　相手を　攻撃する。 守りを　無視して　攻撃できる。

short.en: User switches places with the friendly Pokémon opposite it.

detailed.en: User switches position on the field with the friendly Pokémon opposite it.  If the user is in the middle position in a triple battle, or there are no other friendly Pokémon, this move will fail.

flavortext.en: The user teleports using a strange power and switches places with one of its allies.
flavortext.ko: 이상한 힘으로 순간이동하여 자신과 같은 편의 위치를 바꾼다.
flavortext.de: Wundersame Kräfte teleportieren den Anwender an den Platz eines Mitstreiters.
flavortext.fr: Le lanceur se téléporte à l’aide d’un pouvoir mystérieux. Il échange sa place avec celle d’un allié sur le terrain.
flavortext.es: Extraño poder que intercambia la posición del usuario con la de un aliado sobre el terreno de combate.
flavortext.ja: 不思議な　力で　テレポートして 自分と　味方の　居場所を 入れ替える。

short.en: Causes damage when opposing Pokémon switch in.

detailed.en:
Spreads sharp rocks around the opposing field, damaging any Pokémon that enters the field for 1/8 its max HP.  This damage is affected by the entering Pokémon's susceptibility to rock moves.

rapid spin removes this effect from its user's side of the field.

flavortext.en: The user lays a trap of levitating stones around the opposing team. The trap hurts opposing Pokémon that switch into battle.
flavortext.ko: 상대의 주위에 무수한 바위를 띄워 교체해서 나온 상대 포켓몬에게 데미지를 준다.
flavortext.de: Der Anwender legt eine Falle aus schwebenden Steinen aus, die gegnerische Pokémon verletzen, die in den Kampf gerufen werden.
flavortext.fr: Lance des pierres flottantes autour de l’ennemi, qui blessent tout adversaire entrant au combat.
flavortext.es: Una trampa de rocas que flota en el aire y daña a los objetivos que entran en combate.
flavortext.ja: 相手の　周りに　無数の　岩を 浮かべて　交代で　でてきた　相手の ポケモンに　ダメージを　与える。

short.en: Poisons the target.

detailed.en: Poisons the target.

flavortext.en: A cloud of poison gas is sprayed in the face of opposing Pokémon, poisoning those it hits.
flavortext.ko: 독가스를 상대의 얼굴에 내뿜어 독 상태로 만든다.
flavortext.de: Hüllt gegnerische Pokémon in ein Gas ein, das sie vergiftet.
flavortext.fr: Un nuage de gaz toxique est projeté au visage de l’ennemi pour l’empoisonner.
flavortext.es: Lanza una nube de gas tóxico al objetivo. Produce envenenamiento.
flavortext.ja: 毒ガスを　相手の　顔に　吹きかけて 毒の　状態に　する。

short.en: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

detailed.en: Inflicts regular damage.

flavortext.en: The target is jabbed with a sharply pointed beak or horn.
flavortext.ko: 날카롭고 뾰족한 부리나 뿔로 상대를 쪼아서 공격한다.
flavortext.de: Greift das Ziel mit dem Schnabel oder Horn an.
flavortext.fr: Frappe l’ennemi d’un bec pointu ou d’une corne pour infliger des dégâts.
flavortext.es: Ensarta al objetivo con un cuerno o pico punzante.
flavortext.ja: 鋭く　とがった　くちばしや　つので 相手を　突いて　攻撃する。

short.en: Inflicts regular damage.  Raises the user's Speed by one stage.

detailed.en: Inflicts regular damage.  Raises the user's Speed by one stage.

flavortext.en: Cloaking itself in flame, the user attacks the target. Then, building up more power, the user raises its Speed stat.
flavortext.ko: 불꽃을 둘러 상대를 공격한다. 힘을 모아서 자신의 스피드를 올린다.
flavortext.de: Anwender hüllt sich in Flammen und greift das Ziel an. Sammelt seine Energie und erhöht dadurch die eigene Initiative.
flavortext.fr: Le lanceur s’entoure de flammes pour attaquer l’ennemi. Il se concentre et sa Vitesse augmente.
flavortext.es: Llamas que golpean al objetivo y aumentan la  Velocidad del atacante.
flavortext.ja: 炎を　まとい　相手を　攻撃する。 力を　ためて　自分の 素早さを　あげる。

short.en: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

detailed.en: Inflicts regular damage.

flavortext.en: The target is slugged by a punch thrown with muscle-packed power.
flavortext.ko: 힘을 담은 펀치로 상대를 공격한다.
flavortext.de: Ein unglaublich kräftiger Hieb.
flavortext.fr: L’ennemi reçoit un coup de poing d’une puissance incroyable.
flavortext.es: Un puñetazo de gran potencia.
flavortext.ja: 力を　こめた　パンチで 相手を　攻撃する。

short.en: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

detailed.en: Inflicts regular damage.

flavortext.en: The user lunges at the target at a speed that makes it almost invisible. This move always goes first.
flavortext.ko: 눈에 보이지 않는 굉장한 속도로 상대에게 돌진한다. 반드시 선제공격할 수 있다.
flavortext.de: Bei dieser Erstschlag-Attacke stürzt sich der Anwender so schnell auf das Ziel, dass er quasi unsichtbar wird.
flavortext.fr: Le lanceur fonce sur l’ennemi si rapidement qu’on parvient à peine à le discerner. Frappe en priorité.
flavortext.es: Ataque de una rapidez espeluznante. Este movimiento tiene prioridad alta.
flavortext.ja: 目にも　留まらぬ　ものすごい　速さで 相手に　つっこむ。 必ず　先制攻撃　できる。

Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 30% chance to inflict an effect chosen according to the terrain.

-------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------
Building       | Paralyzes target

short.en: Hits twice in one turn

detailed.en: with a 100% chance to make the target flinch.

flavortext.en: This move raises all the user’s stats but prevents the user from switching out or fleeing.
flavortext.ko: 자신의 모든 능력이 올라가지만 교체하거나 도망칠 수 없게 된다.
flavortext.de: Alle Statuswerte des Anwenders werden erhöht, aber dafür kann er weder ausgewechselt werden noch fliehen.
flavortext.fr: Le lanceur voit toutes ses stats augmenter, mais en contrepartie, il ne peut plus fuir ou se retirer du combat.
flavortext.es: El usuario aumenta todas sus características, pero ya no puede huir ni ser cambiado por otro.
flavortext.ja: 自分の　すべての 能力が　上がるが　交代　したり 逃げることが　できなくなる。

short.en: If the target is paralyzed, inflicts double damage and cures the paralysis.

detailed.en: Inflicts regular damage.  If the target is paralyzed, this move has double power, and the target is cured of its paralysis.

flavortext.en: This move can’t be used. It’s recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.
flavortext.ko: 사용할 수 없는 기술입니다. 다시 배우게 할 수 없지만 기술을 잊게 하는 것을 권장합니다.
flavortext.de: Diese Attacke kann nicht eingesetzt werden. Du solltest dein Pokémon sie vergessen lassen. Beachte aber, dass es sich danach nicht wieder an sie erinnern kann.
flavortext.fr: Cette capacité ne peut pas être utilisée. Il est recommandé de l’oublier, même s’il sera impossible de se la remémorer une fois oubliée.
flavortext.es: Este movimiento no se puede usar, por lo que sería mejor olvidarlo, aunque eso implique que no se pueda recordar posteriormente.
flavortext.ja: この技は　使えません 思い出すことが　できなくなりますが 技を　忘れることを　おすすめします

short.en: Inflicts regular damage. The user turns the ground into Grassy Terrain for five turns.

detailed.en: Inflicts regular damage. The user turns the ground into Grassy Terrain for five turns.

flavortext.en: This is a Grass-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. The user turns the ground into Grassy Terrain for five turns.
flavortext.ko: 다이맥스한 포켓몬이 날리는 풀타입의 공격. 5턴 동안 그래스필드로 만든다.
flavortext.de: Eine Pflanzen-Attacke, die nur Dynamax-Pokémon einsetzen können. Erzeugt fünf Runden lang ein Grasfeld.
flavortext.fr: Une attaque de type Plante que seuls les Pokémon Dynamax peuvent utiliser. Crée un Champ Herbu qui dure cinq tours.
flavortext.es: Ataque de tipo Planta ejecutado por un Pokémon Dinamax. Crea un campo de hierba durante cinco turnos.
flavortext.ja: ダイマックスした　ポケモンが 繰りだす　くさタイプの　攻撃。 ５ターンの　間　グラスフィールドにする。

short.en: Never misses.

detailed.en: Inflicts regular damage.  Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers.

flavortext.en: The user pretends to bow its head, but then it stabs the target with its disheveled hair. This attack never misses.
flavortext.ko: 고개를 숙이는 척하면서 흐트러진 머리카락으로 찌른다. 공격은 반드시 명중한다.
flavortext.de: Der Anwender tut so, als würde er sich verneigen, und sticht dann mit seinem zerzausten Fell zu. Diese Attacke trifft immer.
flavortext.fr: Le lanceur fait semblant de se prosterner et utilise ses cheveux pour poignarder sa cible. Touche à tous les coups.
flavortext.es: El usuario finge hacer una reverencia y aprovecha la ocasión para ensartar al objetivo con su cabello alborotado. Siempre acierta.
flavortext.ja: 頭を　下げる　ふりを　しながら 振りみだした　髪の毛を　突き刺す。 攻撃は　必ず　命中する。

short.en: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.

detailed.en: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.

flavortext.en: The target is punched with an icy fist. This may also leave the target frozen.
flavortext.ko: 냉기를 담은 펀치로 상대를 공격한다. 얼음 상태로 만들 때가 있다.
flavortext.de: Ein eisiger Schlag, der das Ziel eventuell einfriert.
flavortext.fr: Un coup de poing glacé vient frapper l’ennemi. Peut le geler.
flavortext.es: Puñetazo helado que puede llegar a congelar.
flavortext.ja: 冷気を　こめた　パンチで 相手を　攻撃する。 こおり状態に　することが　ある。

short.en: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

detailed.en: Inflicts regular damage.

languages.ja: ブラックホールイクリプス

short.en: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by one stage.

detailed.en: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by one stage.

flavortext.en: The user gathers all its light energy and releases it all at once. This may also lower the target’s Sp. Def stat.
flavortext.ko: 몸의 빛을 한곳에 모아서 힘을 방출한다. 상대의 특수방어를 떨어뜨릴 때가 있다.
flavortext.de: Anwender sammelt Lichtenergie und feuert sie auf einmal ab. Senkt eventuell Spezial-Verteidigung des Zieles.
flavortext.fr: Le lanceur concentre son énergie lumineuse et la fait exploser. Peut aussi baisser la Défense Spéciale de l’ennemi.
flavortext.es: El usuario concentra toda la luz del cuerpo y la libera. Puede bajar la Defensa Especial del objetivo.
flavortext.ja: 体の　光を　一点に　集めて 力を　放つ。 相手の　特防を　さげることが　ある。

short.en: Frees the user from binding moves, removes Leech Seed, and blows away Spikes.

detailed.en: Inflicts regular damage.  Removes leech seed from the user, frees the user from bind, clamp, fire spin, magma storm, sand tomb, whirlpool, and wrap, and clears spikes, stealth rock, and toxic spikes from the user's side of the field.  If this move misses or has no effect, its effect doesn't activate.

flavortext.en: A spin attack that can also eliminate such moves as Bind, Wrap, and Leech Seed. This also raises the user’s Speed stat.
flavortext.ko: 회전해서 상대를 공격한다. 조이기, 김밥말이, 씨뿌리기 등을 날려버린다. 자신의 스피드도 오른다.
flavortext.de: Trifft das Ziel mit einer Dreh-Attacke. Befreit den Anwender unter anderem von Wickel, Klammergriff und Egelsamen. Erhöht die Initiative des Anwenders.
flavortext.fr: Une attaque tournoyante pouvant aussi annuler, par exemple, Étreinte, Ligotage ou Vampigraine. Augmente également la Vitesse du lanceur.
flavortext.es: Ataque giratorio que puede eliminar movimientos como Atadura, Constricción y Drenadoras. También aumenta la Velocidad del usuario.
flavortext.ja: 回転して　相手を　攻撃する。 しめつける　まきつく　やどりぎのタネ　など 吹きとばす。自分の　素早さも　あがる。

short.en: Has an increased chance for a critical hit.

detailed.en: Inflicts regular damage.  User's critical hit rate is one level higher when using this move.

flavortext.en: The user slashes the target the instant an opportunity arises. Critical hits land more easily.
flavortext.ko: 순간적으로 틈을 노려 상대를 베어 버린다. 급소에 맞기 쉽다.
flavortext.de: Anwender greift bei der ersten Gelegenheit mit scharfen Klauen an. Hohe Volltrefferquote.
flavortext.fr: Le lanceur lacère l’ennemi à la première occasion. Taux de critiques élevé.
flavortext.es: Ataca al objetivo a la primera oportunidad. Suele ser crítico.
flavortext.ja: 一瞬の　すきを　ついて 相手を　切りはらう。 急所に　当たりやすい。

short.en: Disables moves and immunities that involve flying or levitating for five turns.

detailed.en:
For five turns (including this one), all immunities to ground moves are disabled.  For the duration of this effect, the evasion of every Pokémon on the field is lowered by two stages.  Cancels the effects of bounce, fly, and sky drop.

Specifically, flying Pokémon and those with levitate or that have used magnet rise are no longer immune to ground attacks, arena trap, spikes, or toxic spikes.

bounce, fly, sky drop, high jump kick, jump kick, and splash cannot be used while this move is in effect.

*Bug*: If this move is used during a double or triple battle while Pokémon are under the effect of sky drop, Sky Drop's effect is not correctly canceled on its target, and it remains high in the air indefinitely.  As Sky Drop prevents the target from acting, the only way to subsequently remove it from the field is to faint it.

flavortext.en: This move enables Flying-type Pokémon or Pokémon with the Levitate Ability to be hit by Ground-type moves. Moves that involve flying can’t be used.
flavortext.ko: 5턴 동안 부유나 비행타입에 땅타입의 기술이 맞게 된다. 공중으로 나는 기술도 사용할 수 없다.
flavortext.de: Ermöglicht es, Flug-Pokémon oder Pokémon mit der Fähigkeit Schwebe mit Boden-Attacken zu treffen. Verhindert Attacken, bei denen der Anwender fliegt.
flavortext.fr: Pendant cinq tours, les Pokémon Vol ou qui ont Lévitation deviennent sensibles aux capacités Sol, et les capacités volantes deviennent inutilisables.
flavortext.es: Durante cinco turnos, se anulan los movimientos que alzan el vuelo y los Pokémon de tipo Volador o que levitan son vulnerables a movimientos de tipo Tierra.
flavortext.ja: ５ターンの間　ふゆうや　ひこうタイプに じめんタイプの　技が　当たるようになる。 空中に　飛ぶ　技も　使えない。

short.en: Inflicts regular damage.  User takes 1/3 the damage it inflicts in recoil.  Has a 10% chance to burn the target.  Frozen Pokémon may use this move, in which case they will thaw.

detailed.en: Inflicts regular damage.  User takes 1/3 the damage it inflicts in recoil.  Has a 10% chance to burn the target.  Frozen Pokémon may use this move, in which case they will thaw.

flavortext.en: The user cloaks itself in fire and charges the target. This also damages the user quite a lot. This attack may leave the target with a burn.
flavortext.ko: 불꽃을 두르고 돌진한다. 자신도 상당한 데미지를 입는다. 화상 상태로 만들 때가 있다.
flavortext.de: Anwender hüllt sich in Flammen und stürmt auf das Ziel zu, das dadurch eventuell Verbrennungen erleidet. Anwender nimmt selbst großen Schaden.
flavortext.fr: Le lanceur s’embrase avant de charger l’ennemi. Le choc blesse aussi gravement le lanceur. Peut brûler l’ennemi.
flavortext.es: El Pokémon se cubre de llamas y carga contra el objetivo, aunque él también recibe daño. Puede quemar.
flavortext.ja: 炎を　まとって　突進する。 自分も　かなり　ダメージを　受ける。 やけど状態に　することが　ある。

short.en: Raises the user's Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by one stage each.

detailed.en: Raises the user's Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by one stage each.

flavortext.en: The user lightly performs a beautiful, mystic dance. This boosts the user’s Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, and Speed stats.
flavortext.ko: 신비롭고 아름다운 춤을 경쾌하게 춘다. 자신의 특수공격과 특수방어와 스피드를 올린다.
flavortext.de: Anwender legt behände einen mystischen, formvollendeten Tanz aufs Parkett. Spezial-Angriff, Spezial-Verteidigung und Initiative steigen.
flavortext.fr: Une danse mystique dont le rythme parfait augmente l’Attaque Spéciale, la Défense Spéciale et la Vitesse du lanceur.
flavortext.es: Danza mística que sube el Ataque Especial, la Defensa Especial y la Velocidad.
flavortext.ja: 神秘的で　美しい　舞を 軽やかに　おどる。　自分の　特攻と 特防と　素早さを　あげる。

short.en: Immediately ends wild battles.  Forces trainers to switch Pokémon.

detailed.en:
Switches the target out for another of its trainer's Pokémon selected at random.  Wild battles end immediately.

Doesn't affect Pokémon with suction cups or under the effect of ingrain.

flavortext.de: Weht das Ziel weg und ersetzt es durch ein anderes Pokémon. In der Wildnis endet der Kampf.
flavortext.ko: 상대를 날려버려서 교대할 포켓몬을 끌어낸다. 야생의 경우에는 배틀이 끝난다.
flavortext.en: The target is blown away, and a different Pokémon is dragged out. In the wild, this ends a battle against a single Pokémon.
flavortext.fr: Éjecte le Pokémon ennemi et le remplace par un autre. Lors d’un combat contre un Pokémon sauvage seul, met fin au combat.
flavortext.ja: 相手を　吹きとばして 控えの　ポケモンを　ひきずりだす。 野生の　場合は　戦闘が　終わる。
flavortext.es: Se lleva al objetivo, que es cambiado por otro Pokémon. Si es un Pokémon salvaje, acaba el combate.

short.en: Never misses.

detailed.en: Inflicts regular damage.  Ignores accuracy and evasion.

flavortext.en: Letting out a charming cry, the user does emotional damage to opposing Pokémon. This attack never misses.
flavortext.ko: 매혹적인 울음소리를 내어 상대에게 정신적 데미지를 준다. 공격은 반드시 명중한다.
flavortext.de: Der Anwender stößt einen bezirzenden Ruf aus, mit dem er gegnerische Pokémon in seinen Bann schlägt und ihnen mentalen Schaden zufügt. Trifft garantiert.
flavortext.fr: Laisse s’échapper une voix enchanteresse qui inflige des dégâts psychiques à l’ennemi. Touche à coup sûr.
flavortext.es: Obnubila a los oponentes con su fascinante voz y les provoca daños emocionales. Siempre acierta al objetivo.
flavortext.ja: 魅惑の　鳴き声を　だして　相手に 精神的な　ダメージを　与える。 攻撃は　必ず　命中　する。

short.en: User digs underground, dodging all attacks, and hits next turn.

detailed.en:
Inflicts regular damage.  User digs underground for one turn, becoming immune to attack, and hits on the second turn.

During the immune turn, earthquake, fissure, and magnitude still hit the user normally, and their power is doubled if appropriate.

The user may be hit during its immune turn if under the effect of lock on, mind reader, or no guard.

This move cannot be selected by sleep talk.

flavortext.en: The user burrows into the ground, then attacks on the next turn.
flavortext.ko: 1턴째에 파고들어 2턴째에 상대를 공격한다.
flavortext.de: In Runde 1 gräbt sich der Anwender ein und in Runde 2 greift er an.
flavortext.fr: Le lanceur creuse au premier tour et frappe au second.
flavortext.es: El usuario cava durante el primer turno y ataca en el segundo.
flavortext.ja: １ターン目に　潜り　２ターン目で 相手を　攻撃する。

short.en: Forces the target to have no Evade, and allows it to be hit by Normal and Fighting moves even if it's a Ghost.

detailed.en: Resets the target's evasion to normal and prevents any further boosting until the target leaves the field.  A ghost under this effect takes normal damage from normal and fighting moves.  This move itself ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers.

flavortext.en: This move can’t be used. It’s recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.
flavortext.ko: 사용할 수 없는 기술입니다. 다시 배우게 할 수 없지만 기술을 잊게 하는 것을 권장합니다.

short.en: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

detailed.en: Inflicts regular damage.

flavortext.de: Das Ziel wird mit einer Schockwelle angegriffen, die aus dem offenen Maul des Anwenders kommt.
flavortext.ko: 큰 입으로 충격파를 일으켜서 상대를 공격한다.
flavortext.en: The target is attacked with a shock wave generated by the user’s gaping mouth.
flavortext.fr: Le lanceur ouvre la bouche pour envoyer une onde de choc qui frappe l’ennemi.
flavortext.es: Abre mucho la boca y libera una onda de choque que ataca al objetivo.
flavortext.ja: 大きな　口から　衝撃波を まきおこして　相手を　攻撃する。

short.en: Prevents the target from leaving battle and inflicts 1/16 its max HP in damage for 2-5 turns.

detailed.en:
Inflicts regular damage.  For the next 2–5 turns, the target cannot leave the field and is damaged for 1/16 its max HP at the end of each turn.  The user continues to use other moves during this time.  If the user leaves the field, this effect ends.

Has a 3/8 chance each to hit 2 or 3 times, and a 1/8 chance each to hit 4 or 5 times.  Averages to 3 hits per use.

If the target is in the first turn of dive, this move will hit with double power.

flavortext.en: The user traps the target in a violent swirling whirlpool for four to five turns.
flavortext.ko: 세차게 소용돌이치는 물속에 4-5턴 동안 상대를 가두어 공격한다.
flavortext.de: Das Ziel wird für vier bis fünf Runden in einer Wasserhose gefangen.
flavortext.fr: Piège l’ennemi dans une trombe d’eau pendant quatre à cinq tours.
flavortext.es: Una tromba de agua atrapa al objetivo durante cuatro o cinco turnos.
flavortext.ja: 激しく　渦をまく　水の中に ４ー５ターンの　間 相手を　閉じこめて　攻撃する。

short.en:
Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 20% chance to make each target flinch.

If the target is under the effect of bounce, fly, or sky drop, this move will hit with double power.

detailed.en:
Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 20% chance to make each target flinch.

If the target is under the effect of bounce, fly, or sky drop, this move will hit with double power.

flavortext.en: The user whips up a vicious tornado to tear at opposing Pokémon. This may also make them flinch.
flavortext.ko: 회오리를 일으켜 상대를 끌어들여 공격한다. 상대를 풀죽게 만들 때가 있다.
flavortext.de: Trifft gegnerische Pokémon mit einem heftigen Wirbelsturm, was diese eventuell zurückschrecken lässt.
flavortext.fr: Déclenche un terrible ouragan sur l’ennemi. Peut aussi l’apeurer.
flavortext.es: Crea un violento tornado para hacer trizas al objetivo. Puede amedrentarlo.
flavortext.ja: 竜巻を　おこして 相手を　まきこみ　攻撃する。 相手を　ひるませることが　ある。

short.en: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

detailed.en: Inflicts regular damage.

flavortext.en: The user attacks with electrically charged fists. This move changes Normal-type moves to Electric-type moves.
flavortext.ko: 전기를 두른 주먹으로 공격한다. 노말타입 기술을 전기타입으로 바꿔버린다.
flavortext.de: Ein Angriff mit elektrisch geladenen Fäusten, der bewirkt, dass Normal-Attacken den Typ Elektro annehmen.
flavortext.fr: Le lanceur attaque en projetant de l’électricité avec ses poings. Convertit les capacités de type Normal en type Électrik.
flavortext.es: El usuario ataca con puños cargados de electricidad. Convierte los movimientos de tipo Normal en movimientos de tipo Eléctrico.
flavortext.ja: 電気を　まとった　こぶしで 攻撃。　ノーマルタイプの　技を でんきタイプに　してしまう。

short.en: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 30% chance to poison the target.

detailed.en: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 30% chance to poison the target.

flavortext.en: Unsanitary sludge is hurled at the target. This may also poison the target.
flavortext.ko: 더러운 오물을 상대에게 내던져서 공격한다. 독 상태로 만들 때가 있다.
flavortext.de: Wirft Schlamm auf das Ziel. Dieses wird eventuell vergiftet.
flavortext.fr: Des détritus toxiques sont projetés sur l’ennemi. Peut aussi l’empoisonner.
flavortext.es: Arroja residuos al objetivo. Puede llegar a envenenar.
flavortext.ja: 汚い　ヘドロを 相手に　投げつけて　攻撃する。 毒状態に　することが　ある。

short.en: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

detailed.en: Inflicts regular damage.

flavortext.en: Hard, pointed, sharp claws rake the target to inflict damage.
flavortext.ko: 단단하고 뾰족한 날카로운 손톱으로 상대를 할퀴어서 공격한다.
flavortext.de: Das Ziel wird mit scharfen Klauen zerkratzt.
flavortext.fr: Lacère l’ennemi avec des griffes acérées pour lui infliger des dégâts.
flavortext.es: Araña con afiladas garras.
flavortext.ja: 硬く　とがった　鋭い　ツメで 相手を　ひっかいて　攻撃する。

short.en: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

detailed.en: Inflicts regular damage.

flavortext.en: The user slams a barrage of hard-shelled seeds down on the target from above.
flavortext.ko: 단단한 껍질을 가지고 있는 큰 씨앗을 위에서 힘껏 내던져 상대를 공격한다.
flavortext.de: Anwender lässt eine Menge Samen mit harter Schale von oben auf das Ziel fallen.
flavortext.fr: Le lanceur fait pleuvoir un déluge de graines explosives sur l’ennemi.
flavortext.es: Lanza al objetivo una descarga de semillas explosivas desde arriba.
flavortext.ja: 硬い　殻を　もつ　大きな　タネを 上から　たたきつけて 相手を　攻撃する。

short.en: User receives 1/4 the damage it inflicts in recoil.

detailed.en: Inflicts regular damage.  User takes 1/4 the damage it inflicts in recoil.

flavortext.en: The user shrouds itself in electricity and smashes into its target. This also damages the user a little.
flavortext.ko: 전기를 두르고 상대에게 부딪쳐 공격한다. 자신도 조금 데미지를 입는다.
flavortext.de: Anwender erzeugt Spannung und greift an, indem er auf Kollisionskurs geht. Er erleidet selbst leichten Schaden.
flavortext.fr: Une charge électrique violente qui blesse aussi légèrement le lanceur.
flavortext.es: Carga eléctrica muy potente que también hiere  ligeramente a quien la usa.
flavortext.ja: 電気を　まとって 相手に　ぶつかって　攻撃する。 自分も　少し　ダメージを　受ける。

short.en: Can only be used as the first move after the user enters battle.

detailed.en: Inflicts regular damage. Can only be used on the user's first turn after entering the field.

flavortext.en: Although this move has great power, it only works the first turn each time the user enters battle.
flavortext.ko: 위력이 높은 기술이지만 배틀에 나가서 바로 쓰지 않으면 성공할 수 없다.
flavortext.de: Eine sehr starke Attacke, die jedoch nur erfolgreich ist, wenn sie sofort eingesetzt wird, nachdem der Anwender das Kampffeld betreten hat.
flavortext.fr: Une capacité très puissante, mais qui ne fonctionne qu’au premier tour.
flavortext.es: Movimiento de gran potencia que solo puede usarse en el turno en que el usuario sale al combate.
flavortext.ja: 威力が　高い　技　だが 戦闘に　出たら すぐに　出さないと　成功　しない。

short.en: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 10% chance to freeze the target and a separate 10% chance to make the target flinch.

detailed.en: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 10% chance to freeze the target and a separate 10% chance to make the target flinch.

flavortext.de: Anwender beißt mit eiskalten Reißzähnen zu. Ziel schreckt eventuell zurück oder friert ein.
flavortext.en: The user bites with cold-infused fangs. This may also make the target flinch or leave it frozen.
flavortext.ko: 냉기를 품은 이빨로 문다. 상대를 풀죽게 하거나 얼음 상태로 만들 때가 있다.
flavortext.fr: Le lanceur utilise une morsure glaciale. Peut aussi geler ou apeurer l’ennemi.
flavortext.es: El usuario muerde al objetivo con colmillos helados y puede hacer que se amedrente o se congele.
flavortext.ja: 冷気を　ひめた　キバで　かみつく。 相手を　ひるませたり こおり状態に　することが　ある。

short.en: Hits every turn for 2-3 turns, then confuses the user.

detailed.en:
Inflicts regular damage.  User is forced to attack with this move for 2–3 turns,selected at random.  After the last hit, the user becomes confused.

safeguard does not protect against the confusion from this move.

flavortext.en: The user rampages and attacks for two to three turns. The user then becomes confused.
flavortext.ko: 2-3턴 동안 마구 난동 부려서 상대를 공격한다. 난동 부린 뒤에는 혼란에 빠진다.
flavortext.de: Attacke über zwei bis drei Runden, die den Anwender danach verwirrt.
flavortext.fr: Une attaque furieuse qui dure de deux à trois tours. Le lanceur devient confus.
flavortext.es: Ataque de dos a tres turnos que acaba confundiendo al agresor.
flavortext.ja: ２ー３ターンの　間 暴れまくって　相手を　攻撃する。 暴れたあとは　混乱する。

short.en: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 30% chance to burn the target.

detailed.en: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 30% chance to burn the target.

flavortext.en: The user torches everything around it in an inferno of scarlet flames. This may also leave those it hits with a burn.
flavortext.ko: 새빨간 불꽃으로 자신의 주위에 있는 포켓몬을 공격한다. 화상 상태로 만들 때가 있다.
flavortext.de: Anwender greift alle Pokémon im Umkreis mit tiefroten Flammen an. Ziele erleiden eventuell Verbrennungen.
flavortext.fr: Des boules de feu s’abattent sur tous les Pokémon autour du lanceur. Peut aussi les brûler.
flavortext.es: Un infierno de llamas daña a los Pokémon adyacentes en combate. Puede quemar.
flavortext.ja: 真っ赤な　炎で　自分の 周りに　いるものを　攻撃する。 やけど状態に　することが　ある。

short.en: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 10% chance to burn the target and a separate 10% chance to make the target flinch.

detailed.en: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 10% chance to burn the target and a separate 10% chance to make the target flinch.

flavortext.de: Anwender beißt mit flammenden Reißzähnen zu. Ziel schreckt eventuell zurück oder erleidet Verbrennungen.
flavortext.ko: 불꽃을 두른 이빨로 문다. 상대를 풀죽게 하거나 화상 상태로 만들 때가 있다.
flavortext.en: The user bites with flame-cloaked fangs. This may also make the target flinch or leave it with a burn.
flavortext.fr: Le lanceur utilise une morsure enflammée. Peut aussi brûler ou apeurer l’ennemi.
flavortext.ja: 炎を　まとった　キバで　かみつく。 相手を　ひるませたり やけど状態に　することが　ある。
flavortext.es: El usuario muerde al objetivo con colmillos en llamas y puede hacer que se amedrente o sufra quemaduras.

short.en: Lowers the target's HP to equal the user's.

detailed.en: Inflicts exactly enough damage to lower the target's HP to equal the user's.  If the target's HP is not higher than the user's, this move has no effect.  Type immunity applies, but other type effects are ignored.  This effect counts as damage for moves that respond to damage.

flavortext.en: This attack move cuts down the target’s HP to equal the user’s HP.
flavortext.ko: 상대의 HP가 자신의 HP와 같아지도록 데미지를 준다.
flavortext.de: Trifft nur, wenn KP des Anwenders geringer als KP des Zieles sind. Senkt dessen KP auf die Höhe der KP des Anwenders.
flavortext.fr: Une attaque qui réduit les PV de l’ennemi au niveau des PV du lanceur.
flavortext.es: Reduce los PS del objetivo para que igualen a los del atacante.
flavortext.ja: 相手の　ＨＰが　自分の　ＨＰと 同じくらいに　なるように ダメージを　与える。

short.en: Halves all Electric-type damage.

detailed.en: electric moves inflict half damage, regardless of target.  If the user leaves the field, this effect ends.

flavortext.de: Diese Attacke kann nicht eingesetzt werden. Du solltest dein Pokémon sie vergessen lassen. Beachte aber, dass es sich danach nicht wieder an sie erinnern kann.
flavortext.ko: 사용할 수 없는 기술입니다. 다시 배우게 할 수 없지만 기술을 잊게 하는 것을 권장합니다.
flavortext.en: This move can’t be used. It’s recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.
flavortext.fr: Cette capacité ne peut pas être utilisée. Il est recommandé de l’oublier, même s’il sera impossible de se la remémorer une fois oubliée.
flavortext.es: Este movimiento no se puede usar, por lo que sería mejor olvidarlo, aunque eso implique que no se pueda recordar posteriormente.
flavortext.ja: この技は　使えません 思い出すことが　できなくなりますが 技を　忘れることを　おすすめします

detailed.en: Inflicts regular damage.

short.en: Damages opponents, but heals allies for 50% of their max HP.

detailed.en: If the target is an opponent, inflicts regular damage.  If the target is an ally, heals the target for 50% of its max HP.

flavortext.de: Der Anwender greift mit einem Ball aus Pollen an, der beim Ziel explodiert. Mitstreiter werden von einem Ball getroffen, der ihre KP auffüllt.
flavortext.ko: 상대에게는 폭발하는 경단을 사용하여 공격한다. 같은 편에게는 회복하는 경단을 준다.
flavortext.en: The user attacks the enemy with a pollen puff that explodes. If the target is an ally, it gives the ally a pollen puff that restores its HP instead.
flavortext.fr: Utilisée sur l’ennemi, envoie une boule explosive qui fait des dégâts ; sur un allié, donne du bon pollen nutritif qui fait récupérer des PV.
flavortext.ja: 敵には　爆発する　だんごを 使って　攻撃。　味方には 回復する　だんごを　与える。
flavortext.es: Ataca al oponente con una bola explosiva. Si esta alcanza a un aliado, le hará recuperar PS.

short.en: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

detailed.en: Inflicts regular damage.

flavortext.en: The user attacks with energy from jealousy. This leaves all opposing Pokémon that have had their stats boosted during the turn with a burn.
flavortext.ko: 질투의 에너지로 상대를 공격한다. 그 턴에 능력이 올라간 포켓몬을 화상 상태로 만든다.
flavortext.de: Der Anwender greift mit der Energie seines Neids an und fügt allen gegnerischen Pokémon, deren Statuswerte in dieser Runde erhöht wurden, Verbrennungen zu.
flavortext.fr: Le lanceur attaque sa cible avec toute sa jalousie. Cette capacité brûle tout Pokémon dont les stats ont augmenté pendant ce tour.
flavortext.es: Ataca al objetivo con la energía generada por la envidia y causa quemaduras a los Pokémon cuyas características hayan aumentado en ese turno.
flavortext.ja: しっとの　エネルギーで　相手を　攻撃。 そのターン　能力が　あがった　ポケモンを やけどの　状態に　する。

short.en: Lowers the target's Defense by one stage.

detailed.en: Lowers the target's Defense by one stage.

flavortext.en: The user gives opposing Pokémon an intimidating leer that lowers the Defense stat.
flavortext.ko: 날카로운 눈초리로 겁을 주어 상대의 방어를 떨어뜨린다.
flavortext.de: Der Verteidigungs-Wert gegnerischer Pokémon wird durch einen angsteinflößenden Blick gesenkt.
flavortext.fr: Le lanceur fait les gros yeux à l’ennemi pour l’intimider et baisser sa Défense.
flavortext.es: Intimida a los rivales para bajar su Defensa.
flavortext.ja: 鋭い　目つきで　おびえさせて 相手の　防御を　さげる。

short.en: Has a higher chance to confuse the target when the recorded sound is louder.

detailed.en:
Inflicts regular damage.  Has either a 1%, 11%, or 31% chance to confuse the target, based on the volume of the recording made for this move; louder recordings increase the chance of confusion.  If the user is not a chatot, this move will not cause confusion.

This move cannot be copied by mimic, mirror move, or sketch, nor selected by assist, metronome, or sleep talk.

flavortext.en: The user attacks the target with sound waves of deafening chatter. This confuses the target.
flavortext.ko: 매우 시끄럽고 수다스러운 음파로 상대를 공격한다. 상대를 혼란시킨다.
flavortext.de: Der Anwender labert das Ziel zu und greift es mit den dadurch entstehenden Schallwellen an, wodurch das Ziel verwirrt wird.
flavortext.fr: Attaque avec les ondes sonores assourdissantes qu’il émet en bavardant. Rend l’ennemi confus.
flavortext.es: Ataca con una onda de sonido muy ruidosa compuesta por palabras y confunde al objetivo.
flavortext.ja: とても　うるさい　おしゃべりの 音波で　相手を　攻撃する。 相手を　混乱させる。

short.en: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

detailed.en: Inflicts regular damage.

flavortext.en: The user, having mastered the Water style, strikes the target with a flowing motion three times in a row. This attack always results in a critical hit.
flavortext.ko: 물의 태세가 극에 달하여 물 흐르듯 3회의 연격을 날린다. 반드시 급소에 맞는다.
flavortext.de: Der Anwender hat den Stil des Wassers gemeistert und führt mit fließenden Bewegungen drei Angriffe in Folge mit Volltreffergarantie aus.
flavortext.fr: Le lanceur assène trois coups fluides à l’ennemi. Cette technique qui inflige toujours un coup critique est réservée à ceux qui maîtrisent la puissance de l’Eau.
flavortext.es: El usuario, dominador absoluto del líquido elemento, golpea hasta tres veces con movimientos fluidos. Siempre asesta un golpe crítico.
flavortext.ja: みずの型を　極めし 流れるような　３回の　連撃。 必ず　急所に　当たる。

short.en: Causes a one-hit KO.

detailed.en:
Inflicts damage equal to the target's max HP.  Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers.  This move's accuracy is 30% plus 1% for each level the user is higher than the target.  If the user is a lower level than the target, this move will fail.

Because this move inflicts a specific and finite amount of damage, endure still prevents the target from fainting.

The effects of lock on, mind reader, and no guard still apply, as long as the user is equal or higher level than the target.  However, they will not give this move a chance to break through detect or protect.

flavortext.en: The user stabs the target with a horn that rotates like a drill. The target faints instantly if this attack hits.
flavortext.ko: 회전하는 뿔을 상대에게 꿰찔러서 공격한다. 맞으면 일격에 기절한다.
flavortext.de: Attacke, bei der ein Horn als Bohrer eingesetzt wird. Ist sie erfolgreich, führt sie zu einem K.O.
flavortext.fr: Un coup de corne en vrille qui empale l’ennemi, le mettant K.O. sur le coup s’il est touché.
flavortext.es: Ataque con un cuerno giratorio que fulmina de un solo golpe al objetivo si lo alcanza.
flavortext.ja: 回転する　つのを 相手に　突き刺して　攻撃する。 当たれば　一撃で　ひんしに　する。

short.en: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 10% chance to make the target flinch.

detailed.en: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 10% chance to make the target flinch.

short.en: User foregoes its next turn to recharge.

detailed.en: Inflicts regular damage.  User loses its next turn to "recharge", and cannot attack or switch out during that turn.

flavortext.de: Das Ziel wird von einer Wasserkanone getroffen. Anwender setzt eine Runde aus.
flavortext.en: The target is hit with a watery blast. The user can’t move on the next turn.
flavortext.ko: 물의 대포를 상대에게 발사해서 공격한다. 다음 턴은 움직일 수 없다.
flavortext.fr: Une trombe d’eau heurte l’ennemi. Le lanceur doit se reposer au tour suivant.
flavortext.ja: 水の　大砲を 相手に　発射して　攻撃する。 次の　ターンは　動けなくなる。
flavortext.es: Disparo de agua. El atacante debe descansar el  siguiente turno.

short.en: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

detailed.en: Inflicts regular damage.

flavortext.en: The user picks up and throws a small rock at the target to attack.
flavortext.ko: 작은 바위를 들어올려 상대에게 내던져서 공격한다.
flavortext.de: Das Ziel wird mit einem kleinen Stein beworfen.
flavortext.fr: Le lanceur lâche une pierre sur l’ennemi.
flavortext.es: Tira una pequeña roca al objetivo.
flavortext.ja: 小さな　岩を　持ちあげて 相手に　投げつけて　攻撃する。

short.en: If there be weather, this move has doubled power and the weather's type.

detailed.en: Inflicts regular damage.  If a weather move is active, this move has double power, and its type becomes the type of the weather move.  shadow sky is typeless for the purposes of this move.

flavortext.en: This attack move varies in power and type depending on the weather.
flavortext.ko: 사용했을 때의 날씨에 따라서 기술 타입과 위력이 바뀐다.
flavortext.de: Typ und Stärke der Attacke sind vom Wetter zum Zeitpunkt der Anwendung abhängig.
flavortext.fr: Une attaque dont la puissance et le type varient en fonction du temps qu’il fait.
flavortext.es: El tipo y fuerza del ataque varían según el tiempo que haga.
flavortext.ja: 使ったときの　天気に　よって 技の　タイプと　威力が　変わる。

short.en: Puts the target to sleep.

detailed.en: Puts the target to sleep.

flavortext.en: Opposing Pokémon are dragged into a world of total darkness that makes them sleep.
flavortext.ko: 암흑의 세계로 끌고 가서 떨어뜨려 상대를 잠듦 상태로 만든다.
flavortext.de: Gegnerische Pokémon werden in eine Welt der Dunkelheit gezogen und in Schlaf versetzt.
flavortext.fr: L’ennemi est plongé dans les ténèbres. Il tombe dans un profond sommeil.
flavortext.es: El objetivo es enviado a un mundo de tinieblas que lo hace dormir.
flavortext.ja: 暗黒の　世界に　ひきずり　落として 相手を　眠り状態に　する。

short.en: Power doubles every turn this move is used in succession after the first, maxing out after five turns.

detailed.en: Inflicts regular damage.  Power doubles after every time this move is used, whether consecutively or not, maxing out at 16x.  If this move misses or the user leaves the field, power resets.

flavortext.en: The target is slashed with scythes or claws. This attack becomes more powerful if it hits in succession.
flavortext.ko: 낫이나 발톱 등으로 상대를 베어 공격한다. 연속으로 맞히면 위력이 올라간다.
flavortext.de: Eine Attacke mit Scheren oder Klauen, deren Härte bei aufeinanderfolgenden Treffern zunimmt.
flavortext.fr: Un coup de faux ou de griffe dont la force augmente quand il touche plusieurs fois d’affilée.
flavortext.es: Ataque con garras o guadaña que crece en intensidad si se usa repetidas veces.
flavortext.ja: カマや　ツメなどで　相手を 切りつけて　攻撃する。 連続で　当てると　威力が　あがる。

short.en: Lowers the target's Attack by one stage.

detailed.en: Lowers the target's Attack by one stage.

flavortext.en: The user growls in an endearing way, making opposing Pokémon less wary. This lowers their Attack stats.
flavortext.ko: 귀여운 울음소리를 들려주고 관심을 끌어 방심한 사이에 상대의 공격을 떨어뜨린다.
flavortext.de: Der Anwender heult herzzerreißend, um gegnerische Pokémon nachlässig werden zu lassen und deren Angriffs-Wert zu senken.
flavortext.fr: Le lanceur pousse un cri tout mimi pour tromper la vigilance de l’ennemi et baisser son Attaque.
flavortext.es: Dulce gruñido que reduce el Ataque del equipo rival.
flavortext.ja: かわいい　なきごえを　聞かせて 気を　ひき　油断を　させて 相手の　攻撃を　さげる。

short.en: Lowers the target's Attack by one stage after inflicting damage.

detailed.en: Inflicts regular damage.  Lowers the target's Attack by one stage.

flavortext.de: Der Anwender schwingt heftig seinen robusten Schweif, um damit gegnerische Pokémon anzugreifen und ihren Angriffs-Wert zu senken.
flavortext.ko: 강인한 꼬리를 세차게 휘둘러서 상대를 공격한다. 상대의 공격을 떨어뜨린다.
flavortext.en: The user swings its tough tail wildly and attacks opposing Pokémon. This also lowers their Attack stats.
flavortext.fr: Le lanceur balaie violemment le camp adverse avec son immense queue. Baisse l’Attaque de la cible.
flavortext.ja: きょうじんな　しっぽを　激しく ふりはらって　相手を　攻撃する。 相手の　攻撃を　下げる。
flavortext.es: El usuario sacude violentamente su enorme cola para golpear a todos los rivales y reducir su Ataque a la par.

short.en: If target has a berry, inflicts double damage and uses the berry.

detailed.en:
Inflicts regular damage.  If the target is holding a berry, this move has double power, and the user takes the berry and uses it immediately.

If the target is holding a jaboca berry or rowap berry, the berry is still removed, but has no effect.

If this move is super effective and the target is holding a berry that can reduce this move's damage, it will do so, and will not be stolen.

flavortext.en: The user pecks the target. If the target is holding a Berry, the user eats it and gains its effect.
flavortext.ko: 부리로 공격한다. 상대가 나무열매를 지니고 있을 때 먹어서 나무열매의 효과를 받을 수 있다.
flavortext.de: Anwender pickt das Ziel, nimmt die Beere, falls das Ziel eine trägt, und erhält ihren Effekt.
flavortext.fr: Le lanceur picore la cible. Si cette dernière tient une Baie, le lanceur la mange et profite de ses effets.
flavortext.es: Picotea al objetivo. Si este sostiene una baya, la picotea también y obtiene sus efectos.
flavortext.ja: くちばしで　攻撃。 相手が　きのみを　持っているとき 食べて　きのみの　効果を　受けられる。

short.en: Inflicts regular damage.  User takes 1/3 the damage it inflicts in recoil.  Has a 10% chance to paralyze the target.

detailed.en: Inflicts regular damage.  User takes 1/3 the damage it inflicts in recoil.  Has a 10% chance to paralyze the target.

flavortext.en: The user electrifies itself and charges the target. This also damages the user quite a lot. This attack may leave the target with paralysis.
flavortext.ko: 전기를 한데 모아 돌진한다. 자신도 상당한 데미지를 입는다. 마비 상태로 만들 때가 있다.
flavortext.de: Angriff mit Elektro-Tackle. Der Anwender nimmt dabei selbst großen Schaden. Das Ziel wird eventuell paralysiert.
flavortext.fr: Le lanceur électrifie son corps avant de charger. Le choc blesse aussi gravement le lanceur et peut paralyser l’ennemi.
flavortext.ja: 電気を　まとって　突進する。 自分も　かなり　ダメージを　受ける。 まひ状態に　することが　ある。
flavortext.es: Quien lo usa electrifica su cuerpo para luego atacar.  Se hiere mucho a sí mismo, pero puede paralizar al  objetivo.

short.en: Cannot be disrupted by abilities.

detailed.en: Inflicts regular damage.  Other Pokémon's abilities cannot activate in response to this move.  In particular, it hits through disguise

flavortext.en: This move can’t be used. It’s recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.
flavortext.ko: 사용할 수 없는 기술입니다. 다시 배우게 할 수 없지만 기술을 잊게 하는 것을 권장합니다.
flavortext.de: Diese Attacke kann nicht eingesetzt werden. Du solltest dein Pokémon sie vergessen lassen. Beachte aber, dass es sich danach nicht wieder an sie erinnern kann.
flavortext.fr: Cette capacité ne peut pas être utilisée. Il est recommandé de l’oublier, même s’il sera impossible de se la remémorer une fois oubliée.
flavortext.es: Este movimiento no se puede usar, por lo que sería mejor olvidarlo, aunque eso implique que no se pueda recordar posteriormente.
flavortext.ja: この技は　使えません 思い出すことが　できなくなりますが 技を　忘れることを　おすすめします

languages.ja: ムーンライトブラスター

short.en: For five turns, heals all Pokémon on the ground for 1/16 max HP each turn and strengthens their grass moves to 1.5× their power.

detailed.en:
For five turns, heals all Pokémon on the ground for 1/16 their max HP each turn and strengthens their grass moves to 1.5× their power.

Changes nature power to energy ball.

flavortext.en: The user turns the ground to grass for five turns. This restores the HP of Pokémon on the ground a little every turn and powers up Grass-type moves.
flavortext.ko: 5턴 동안 그래스필드로 만든다. 땅에 있으면 매 턴 회복한다. 풀타입의 위력이 올라간다.
flavortext.de: Regeneriert fünf Runden lang in jeder neuen Runde ein paar KP aller Pokémon, die den Boden berühren. Erhöht die Stärke von Pflanzen-Attacken.
flavortext.fr: Pendant cinq tours, les Pokémon au sol récupèrent quelques PV à chaque tour et la puissance des capacités de type Plante augmente.
flavortext.es: Durante cinco turnos, se potencian los movimientos de tipo Planta y los Pokémon que están en contacto con el suelo recuperan PS en cada turno.
flavortext.ja: ５ターンの　間　グラスフィールドにする。 地面にいると　毎ターン　回復する。 くさタイプの　威力が　あがる。

short.en: Ends wild battles.  Forces trainers to switch Pokémon.

detailed.en:
Inflicts regular damage, then switches the target out for another of its trainer's Pokémon, selected at random.

If the target is under the effect of ingrain or suction cups, or it has a substitute, or its Trainer has no more usable Pokémon, it will not be switched out.  If the target is a wild Pokémon, the battle ends instead.

flavortext.en: The target is knocked away, and a different Pokémon is dragged out. In the wild, this ends a battle against a single Pokémon.
flavortext.ko: 상대를 튕겨내서 교대할 포켓몬을 끌어낸다. 야생의 경우에는 배틀이 끝난다.
flavortext.de: Putzt das Ziel vom Feld und wechselt es mit einem anderen Pokémon aus. Beendet Kämpfe gegen wilde Pokémon.
flavortext.fr: Un coup puissant qui blesse la cible et l’envoie au loin. Lors d’un combat contre un Pokémon sauvage seul, met fin au combat.
flavortext.es: Ataca al objetivo y lo obliga a cambiarse por otro  Pokémon. Si es uno salvaje, acaba el combate.
flavortext.ja: 相手を　はじきとばして 控えの　ポケモンを　ひきずりだす。 野生の　場合は　戦闘が　終わる。

short.en: Target drops its held item.

detailed.en:
Inflicts regular damage.  Target loses its held item.

Neither the user nor the target can recover its item with recycle.

If the target has multitype or sticky hold, it will take damage but not lose its item.

flavortext.en: The user slaps down the target’s held item, and that item can’t be used in that battle. The move does more damage if the target has a held item.
flavortext.ko: 상대의 지닌 물건을 탁 쳐서 떨어뜨려 배틀이 끝날 때까지 사용할 수 없게 한다. 물건을 가진 상대에게는 데미지를 더 준다.
flavortext.de: Schlägt das Item des Zieles weg und vereitelt so dessen Gebrauch während des Kampfes. Mehr Schaden gegen Ziele, die ein Item bei sich tragen.
flavortext.fr: Fait plus de dégâts aux cibles qui tiennent un objet. De plus, fait tomber cet objet et empêche la cible de l’utiliser jusqu’à la fin du combat.
flavortext.es: Impide al objetivo usar el objeto que lleva durante el combate. La potencia del movimiento se multiplica si el objetivo lleva un objeto.
flavortext.ja: 相手の　持ち物を　はたき　落として 戦闘が　終わるまで　使えなくする。 物を持つ　相手には　ダメージが増す。

short.en: Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.

detailed.en: Inflicts regular damage.  Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.

flavortext.en: A nutrient-draining attack. The user’s HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.
flavortext.ko: 양분을 흡수하여 공격한다. 상대에게 입힌 데미지의 절반에 해당하는 HP를 회복할 수 있다.
flavortext.de: Attacke, die die Hälfte des Schadens absorbiert.
flavortext.fr: Une attaque qui convertit la moitié des dégâts infligés en PV pour le lanceur.
flavortext.es: Un ataque que absorbe nutrientes. Quien lo usa recupera la mitad de los PS del daño que produce.
flavortext.ja: 養分を　吸い取り　攻撃する。 相手に　与えた　ダメージの 半分の　ＨＰを　回復できる。

short.en: Doubles prize money.

detailed.en:
Doubles prize money.

Stacks with a held item.  Only works once per battle.

flavortext.en: Using Happy Hour doubles the amount of prize money received after battle.
flavortext.ko: 해피타임 기술을 쓰면 배틀 후에 받을 수 있는 돈이 배가 된다.
flavortext.de: Nach Einsatz der Attacke Goldene Zeiten verdoppelt sich das Preisgeld, das du im Falle eines Sieges erhältst.
flavortext.fr: Utilisée pendant un combat, multiplie par deux l’argent gagné à la fin.
flavortext.es: Al usar este movimiento se consigue duplicar la  recompensa recibida tras el combate.
flavortext.ja: ハッピータイムの　技を　使うと 戦闘の　あとで　もらえる お金が　倍になる。

short.en: Randomly uses one of the user's other three moves.  Only works if the user is sleeping.

detailed.en:
Only usable if the user is sleeping.  Randomly selects and uses one of the user's other three moves.  Use of the selected move requires and costs 0 PP.

This move will not select assist, bide, bounce, chatter, copycat, dig, dive, fly, focus punch, me first, metronome, mirror move, shadow force, skull bash, sky attack, sky drop, sleep talk, solar beam, razor wind, or uproar.

If the selected move requires a recharge turn—i.e., one of blast burn, frenzy plant, giga impact, hydro cannon, hyper beam, roar of time, or rock wrecker—and the user is still sleeping next turn, then it's forced to use this move again and pay another PP for the recharge turn.

This move cannot be copied by mirror move, nor selected by assist, metronome, or sleep talk.

flavortext.en: While it is asleep, the user randomly uses one of the moves it knows.
flavortext.ko: 자신이 배운 기술 중 하나를 무작위로 날린다. 자신이 잠들어 있을 때만 쓸 수 있다.
flavortext.de: Anwender setzt per Zufall eine ihm bekannte Attacke ein. Klappt nur, wenn der Anwender gerade schläft.
flavortext.fr: Le lanceur utilise une de ses capacités au hasard pendant qu’il dort.
flavortext.es: Mientras duerme, usa uno de sus movimientos elegido al azar.
flavortext.ja: 自分が　おぼえている　技の　うち どれか　１つを　くりだす。 自分が　寝ているときだけ　使える。

short.en: Only works on sleeping Pokémon.  Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.

detailed.en: Fails if not used on a sleeping Pokémon.  Inflicts regular damage.  Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.

flavortext.en: The user eats the dreams of a sleeping target. The user’s HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.
flavortext.ko: 잠자고 있는 상대의 꿈을 먹어 공격한다. 데미지의 절반을 HP로 회복한다.
flavortext.de: Frisst die Träume eines schlafenden Zieles. Anwender wird um die Hälfte des zugefügten Schadens geheilt.
flavortext.fr: Le lanceur mange le rêve de l’ennemi endormi et récupère en PV la moitié des dégâts infligés.
flavortext.es: Restaura al usuario la mitad del daño causado a un  objetivo dormido.
flavortext.ja: 寝ている　相手の　夢を　食べて 攻撃する。　ダメージの　半分の ＨＰを　回復する。

short.en: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 10% chance to burn the target.

detailed.en: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 10% chance to burn the target.

flavortext.de: Ein feuriger Schlag, der dem Ziel eventuell Verbrennungen zufügt.
flavortext.ko: 불꽃을 담은 펀치로 상대를 공격한다. 화상 상태로 만들 때가 있다.
flavortext.en: The target is punched with a fiery fist. This may also leave the target with a burn.
flavortext.fr: Un coup de poing enflammé vient frapper l’ennemi. Peut le brûler.
flavortext.ja: 炎を　こめた　パンチで 相手を　攻撃する。 やけど状態に　することが　ある。
flavortext.es: Puñetazo ardiente que puede causar quemaduras.

short.en: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

detailed.en: Inflicts regular damage.

flavortext.en: The user attacks the target by controlling the target’s item. The move fails if the target doesn’t have an item.
flavortext.ko: 상대의 지닌 물건을 조종해서 공격한다. 상대가 도구를 지니고 있지 않으면 실패한다.
flavortext.de: Der Anwender greift das Ziel mit dessen getragenem Item an. Die Attacke schlägt fehl, wenn das Ziel kein Item trägt.
flavortext.fr: Le lanceur manipule l’objet tenu par l’ennemi pour l’attaquer. Échoue si la cible ne tient rien.
flavortext.es: El usuario ataca utilizando el objeto que lleva el rival. Si no tiene ninguno equipado, el movimiento falla.
flavortext.ja: 相手の　持ち物を　あやつって　攻撃。 相手が　道具を　持っていない　場合は 失敗する。

short.en: Inflicts regular damage. This raises ally Pokémon’s Defense stats.

detailed.en: Inflicts regular damage. This raises ally Pokémon’s Defense stats.

flavortext.en: This is a Steel-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. This raises ally Pokémon’s Defense stats.
flavortext.ko: 다이맥스한 포켓몬이 날리는 강철타입의 공격. 같은 편의 방어를 올린다.
flavortext.de: Eine Stahl-Attacke, die nur Dynamax-Pokémon einsetzen können. Erhöht die Verteidigung der Mitstreiterseite.
flavortext.fr: Une attaque de type Acier que seuls les Pokémon Dynamax peuvent utiliser. Augmente la Défense des alliés.
flavortext.es: Ataque de tipo Acero ejecutado por un Pokémon Dinamax. Aumenta la Defensa de tu bando.
flavortext.ja: ダイマックスした　ポケモンが 繰りだす　はがねタイプの　攻撃。 味方の　防御を　上げる。

short.en: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

detailed.en: Inflicts regular damage.

flavortext.en: This move can’t be used. It’s recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.
flavortext.ko: 사용할 수 없는 기술입니다. 다시 배우게 할 수 없지만 기술을 잊게 하는 것을 권장합니다.
flavortext.de: Diese Attacke kann nicht eingesetzt werden. Du solltest dein Pokémon sie vergessen lassen. Beachte aber, dass es sich danach nicht wieder an sie erinnern kann.
flavortext.fr: Cette capacité ne peut pas être utilisée. Il est recommandé de l’oublier, même s’il sera impossible de se la remémorer une fois oubliée.

flavortext.ja: この技は　使えません 思い出すことが　できなくなりますが 技を　忘れることを　おすすめします

languages.ja: アルティメットドラゴンバーン

short.en: Prevents the target from fleeing and inflicts damage for 2-5 turns.

detailed.en:
Inflicts regular damage.  For the next 2–5 turns, the target cannot leave the field and is damaged for 1/16 its max HP at the end of each turn.  The user continues to use other moves during this time.  If the user leaves the field, this effect ends.

Has a 3/8 chance each to hit 2 or 3 times, and a 1/8 chance each to hit 4 or 5 times.  Averages to 3 hits per use.

rapid spin cancels this effect.

flavortext.de: Der Anwender fällt vier bis fünf Runden lang wie eine Plage über das Ziel her und greift es an. In diesem Zeitraum kann es nicht fliehen.
flavortext.en: The target is infested and attacked for four to five turns. The target can’t flee during this time.
flavortext.ko: 4-5턴 동안 상대에게 엉겨 붙어서 공격한다. 그동안 상대는 도망갈 수 없다.
flavortext.fr: Cette attaque perdure pendant quatre à cinq tours. L’ennemi ne peut pas fuir au cours de cette période.
flavortext.ja: ４ー５ターンの　間　相手に まとわりついて　攻撃する。 そのあいだ　相手は　逃げられない。
flavortext.es: Hostiga al objetivo durante cuatro o cinco turnos e impide que pueda huir mientras tanto.

short.en: Inflicts regular damage.

detailed.en: Inflicts regular damage.

flavortext.de: Der Anwender greift alle Pokémon im Umkreis mit einem gewaltigen Knall an.
flavortext.ko: 무시무시한 폭음의 파괴력으로 주위에 있는 포켓몬을 공격한다.
flavortext.en: The user attacks everything around it with the destructive power of a terrible, explosive sound.
flavortext.fr: Attaque les Pokémon alentour grâce à une onde sonore assourdissante qui détruit tout sur son passage.
flavortext.es: Ataca a todos los Pokémon a su alrededor con una  potentísima onda sonora.
flavortext.ja: すさまじい　爆音の 破壊力に　よって 周りに　いるものを　攻撃する。

short.en: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 20% chance to make the target flinch.

detailed.en: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 20% chance to make the target flinch.

flavortext.en: The user charges at the target and may make it flinch.
flavortext.ko: 굉장한 기세로 상대에게 돌진한다. 상대를 풀죽게 만들 때가 있다.
flavortext.de: Eine mächtige Attacke, durch die das Ziel eventuell zurückschreckt.
flavortext.fr: Le lanceur charge l’ennemi à une vitesse remarquable, ce qui peut l’apeurer.
flavortext.es: Embiste con un gran impulso que puede llegar a amedrentar.
flavortext.ja: すごい　勢いで　相手に　つっこむ。 相手を　ひるませることが　ある。

short.en: Steals the target's move, if it's self-targeted.

detailed.en:
The next time a Pokémon uses a beneficial move on itself or itself and its ally this turn, the user of this move will steal the move and use it itself.  Moves which may be stolen by this move are identified by the "snatchable" flag.

If two Pokémon use this move on the same turn, the faster Pokémon will steal the first beneficial move, and the slower Pokémon will then steal it again—thus, only the slowest Pokémon using this move ultimately gains a stolen move's effect.

If the user steals psych up, it will target the Pokémon that used psych up.  If the user was the original target of psych up, and the Pokémon that originally used it's affected by pressure, it will only lose 1 PP.

This move cannot be copied by mirror move, nor selected by assist or metronome.

flavortext.en: This move can’t be used. It’s recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.
flavortext.ko: 사용할 수 없는 기술입니다. 다시 배우게 할 수 없지만 기술을 잊게 하는 것을 권장합니다.

short.en: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by one stage.

detailed.en: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by one stage.

flavortext.en: The user strikes everything around it by stomping down on the ground. This lowers the Speed stats of those hit.
flavortext.ko: 땅을 힘껏 밟아 자신의 주위에 있는 포켓몬을 공격한다. 상대의 스피드를 떨어뜨린다.
flavortext.de: Anwender walzt den Boden platt und greift dabei alle Pokémon im Umkreis an. Die Initiative aller betroffenen Pokémon sinkt.
flavortext.fr: Le lanceur piétine le sol et inflige des dégâts à tous les Pokémon autour de lui. Baisse aussi leur Vitesse.

short.en: Power doubles every turn this move is used in succession after the first, resetting after five turns.

detailed.en:
Inflicts regular damage.  User is forced to use this move for five turns.  Power doubles every time this move is used in succession to a maximum of 16x, and resets to normal after the lock-in ends.  If this move misses or becomes unusable, the lock-in ends.

If the user has used defense curl since entering the field, this move has double power.

flavortext.en: The user continually rolls into the target over five turns. It becomes more powerful each time it hits.
flavortext.ko: 5턴 동안 구르기를 반복하여 공격한다. 기술이 맞을 때마다 위력이 올라간다.
flavortext.de: Attacke, die fünf Runden dauert. Mit jedem Treffer steigt die Stärke.
flavortext.fr: Un rocher roule sur l’ennemi pendant cinq tours. L’attaque gagne en puissance à chaque coup.
flavortext.es: El atacante rueda contra el objetivo durante cinco  turnos, cada vez con mayor fuerza.
flavortext.ja: ５ターンの　間　転がり続けて 攻撃する。　技が　当たるたびに 威力が　あがる。

short.en: Hits 2-5 times in one turn.

detailed.en:
Inflicts regular damage.  Hits 2–5 times in one turn.

Has a 3/8 chance each to hit 2 or 3 times, and a 1/8 chance each to hit 4 or 5 times.  Averages to 3 hits per use.

flavortext.en: The user attacks by striking the target with its hard tail. It hits the target two to five times in a row.
flavortext.ko: 단단한 꼬리로 상대를 때려서 공격한다. 2-5회 동안 연속으로 쓴다.
flavortext.de: Anwender greift das Ziel mit seiner schlagfesten Rute zwei- bis fünfmal hintereinander an.
flavortext.fr: Le lanceur frappe l’ennemi de deux à cinq fois d’affilée avec sa queue robuste.
flavortext.es: Golpea con la cola de dos a cinco veces seguidas.
flavortext.ja: 硬い　しっぽで 相手を　たたいて　攻撃する。 ２ー５回の　間　連続で　だす。

short.en: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 100% chance to burn the target.

detailed.en: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 100% chance to burn the target.

flavortext.de: Anwender greift das Ziel an, indem er es mit dichten Flammen umhüllt. Ziel erleidet Verbrennungen.
flavortext.en: The user attacks by engulfing the target in an intense fire. This leaves the target with a burn.
flavortext.ko: 격렬한 불꽃으로 상대를 둘러싸 공격한다. 화상 상태로 만든다.

flavortext.ja: 激しい　炎で 相手を　包みこみ　攻撃する。 やけど状態に　する。

short.en: Disables the target's last used move for 1-8 turns.

detailed.en: Disables the target's last used move, preventing its use for 4–7 turns, selected at random, or until the target leaves the field.  If the target hasn't used a move since entering the field, if it tried to use a move this turn and failed,  if its last used move has 0 PP remaining, or if it already has a move disabled, this move will fail.

flavortext.en: For four turns, this move prevents the target from using the move it last used.
flavortext.ko: 상대의 움직임을 막아 바로 전에 쓴 기술을 4턴 동안 사용할 수 없게 만든다.
flavortext.de: Die zuletzt eingesetzte Attacke des Zieles wird für vier Runden blockiert.
flavortext.fr: Empêche l’ennemi d’employer à nouveau sa dernière attaque. Dure quatre tours.
flavortext.es: Desactiva el último movimiento del objetivo durante  cuatro turnos.
flavortext.ja: 相手の　動きを　とめて 直前に　だしていた　技を ４ターンの　間　使えなくする。

short.en: Transfers 1/4 of the user's max HP into a doll, protecting the user from further damage or status changes until it breaks.

detailed.en:
Transfers 1/4 the user's max HP into a doll that absorbs damage and causes most negative move effects to fail.  If the user leaves the field, the doll will vanish.  If the user cannot pay the HP cost, this move will fail.

The doll takes damage as normal, using the user's stats and types, and will break when its HP reaches zero.  Self-inflicted damage from confusion or recoil is not absorbed.  Healing effects from opponents ignore the doll and heal the user as normal.  Moves that work based on the user's HP still do so; the doll's HP does not influence any move.

The doll will block major status effects, confusion, and flinching.  The effects of smelling salts and wake up slap do not trigger against a doll, even if the Pokémon behind the doll has the appropriate major status effect.  Multi-turn trapping moves like wrap will hit the doll for their regular damage, but the multi-turn trapping and damage effects will not activate.

Moves blocked or damage absorbed by the doll do not count as hitting the user or inflicting damage for any effects that respond to such, e.g., avalanche, counter, or a rowap berry.  magic coat still works as normal, even against moves the doll would block.  Opposing Pokémon that damage the doll with a leech move like absorb are healed as normal.

It will also block acupressure, block, the curse effect of curse, dream eater, embargo, flatter, gastro acid, grudge, heal block, leech seed, lock on, mean look, mimic, mind reader, nightmare, pain split, psycho shift, spider web, sketch, swagger, switcheroo, trick, worry seed, and yawn.  A Pokémon affected by yawn before summoning the doll will still fall to sleep.

The doll blocks intimidate, but all other abilities act as though the doll did not exist.  If the user has an ability that absorbs moves of a certain type for HP (such as volt absorb absorbing thunder wave), such moves will not be blocked.

life orb and berries that cause confusion still work as normal, but their respective HP loss and confusion are absorbed/blocked by the doll.

The user is still vulnerable to damage inflicted when entering or leaving the field, such as by pursuit or spikes; however, the doll will block the poison effect of toxic spikes.

The doll is passed on by baton pass.  It keeps its existing HP, but uses the replacement Pokémon's stats and types for damage calculation.

All other effects work as normal.

flavortext.en: The user creates a substitute for itself using some of its HP. The substitute serves as the user’s decoy.
flavortext.ko: 자신의 HP를 조금 깎아서 분신을 만든다. 분신은 자신의 대타가 된다.
flavortext.de: Anwender setzt eine kleine Menge an KP ein, um einen Doppelgänger zu erzeugen, der für ihn Schläge einsteckt.
flavortext.fr: Le lanceur crée un clone en sacrifiant quelques PV. Ce clone sert de leurre.
flavortext.es: Utiliza parte de los PS propios para crear un sustituto que actúa como señuelo.
flavortext.ja: 自分の　ＨＰを　少し　削って 分身を　だす。 分身は　自分の　身代わりに　なる。

short.en: Heals the user by half its max HP.

detailed.en: Heals the user for half its max HP.

flavortext.en: The user restores its own HP by up to half of its max HP.

flavortext.es: Restaura la mitad de los PS máximos del usuario.
flavortext.ja: 最大ＨＰの　半分 自分の　ＨＰを　回復する。

short.en: User swaps Defense and Special Defense changes with the target.

detailed.en: User swaps its Defense and Special Defense modifiers with the target.

flavortext.de: Psychische Kräfte tauschen Änderungen an Verteidigung und Spezial-Verteidigung mit denen des Zieles.
flavortext.ko: 초능력으로 자신과 상대의 방어와 특수방어의 능력 변화를 교체한다.

short.en: Target falls in love if it has the opposite gender, and has a 50% chance to refuse attacking the user.

detailed.en: Causes the target to fall in love with the user, giving it a 50% chance to do nothing each turn.  If the user and target are the same gender, or either is genderless, this move will fail.  If either Pokémon leaves the field, this effect ends.

flavortext.en: If it is the opposite gender of the user, the target becomes infatuated and less likely to attack.
flavortext.ko: 수컷은 암컷을 암컷은 수컷을 유혹하여 헤롱헤롱하게 만든다. 상대가 기술을 쓰기 어려워진다.

flavortext.fr: Si l’ennemi est du sexe opposé, il tombe amoureux et rechigne alors à attaquer.
flavortext.es: Si el objetivo es del sexo opuesto, se enamorará y  bajará la posibilidad de que ataque.
flavortext.ja: ♂なら♀を　♀なら♂を　誘惑して メロメロに　する。 相手は　技が　だしにくくなる。

short.en: User takes 1/4 its max HP in recoil.

detailed.en:
Inflicts typeless regular damage.  User takes 1/4 its max HP in recoil.  Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers.

This move is used automatically when a Pokémon cannot use any other move legally, e.g., due to having no PP remaining or being under the effect of both encore and torment at the same time.

This move's recoil is not treated as recoil for the purposes of anything that affects recoil, such as the ability rock head.  It also is not prevented by magic guard.

This move cannot be copied by mimic, mirror move, or sketch, nor selected by assist or metronome, nor forced by encore.

flavortext.en: This attack is used in desperation only if the user has no PP. It also damages the user a little.
flavortext.ko: 자신의 PP가 떨어지면 발버둥 쳐 상대를 공격한다. 자신도 조금 데미지를 입는다.

flavortext.fr: Une attaque désespérée, utilisée quand le lanceur n’a plus de PP. Le blesse aussi légèrement.
flavortext.es: Solo se usa como último recurso al acabarse los PP.  Hiere un poco al agresor.
flavortext.ja: 自分の　ＰＰが　なくなると あがいて　相手を　攻撃する。 自分も　少し　ダメージを　受ける。

short.en: Raises the user's Attack and accuracy by one stage.

detailed.en: Raises the user's Attack and accuracy by one stage.

flavortext.ko: 손톱을 갈아 날카롭게 한다. 자신의 공격과 명중률을 올린다.
flavortext.de: Wetzt seine Klauen, um sie zu schärfen. Erhöht Angriff und Genauigkeit des Anwenders.
